name: digital-dj
description: add you and your friends' favorite tunes to the music que for any event or party

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.update: ncu && ncu -u && cd server && ncu && ncu -u && cd ../client && ncu && ncu -u

author: www.github.com/jrapich
